website_summaries.verdict: Fabric of the unit is breathable, which allows your clothes or linens to remain fresh despite being in storage.
pros: Those concerned with their impact on the environment should love this product as it's eco-friendly
It also comes with a see-through top that allows you to know what's inside
It's strong and can endure multiple uses
The breathability of the product is impressive
cons: Some concerns about the strength of the zipper

customer_reviews.title: Love the handle on the end to make it easier ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this low profile storage for my emergency kit to keep in my car. My Rogue has a compartment under the the lift up cargo and I'm keeping it under there. It is soft, compliant so it doesn't bang around while taking curves since I live in the Ozarks. Love the handle on the end to make it easier to grab.
customer_reviews.author: Patti King

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Under Bed Storage Bags
customer_reviews.text: These are the best storage bags I've found. I needed to contact their customer service department and couldn't have been more pleased with their super fast reply... and their customer service is off the chart amazing. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Soft sides
customer_reviews.text: I do not have the usual 5-6 inch height allowance under my bed. This storage unit has soft collapsible sides that allow me to push it under the bed. The unit is well constructed. The zipper opens from both directions. I love the clear top to set what is inside. I did put a thin piece of board in the bottom to make it easier to push under the bed on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for under the bed storage.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for under bed storage. I use them for seasonal storage. Very easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Strid

customer_reviews.title: Product works
customer_reviews.text: Product works. Fits nicely under twin bed. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: mar62

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for weighted blanket storage, so far holding up well
customer_reviews.author: Maj

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: Good for under bed storage, if not packed full is hard to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: dragonfly322

customer_reviews.title: Great and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for dress up storage. Works great. It doesn't stay in a still box shape. It's a the material ks a mesh like and a plastic like. Both are flexable. If your looking for a hard plastic this is not it. It's very affordable. Fits a lot of stuff. There is so much room in these. I have lots of room left. It fits well under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Aangel310

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Under Bed Stash
customer_reviews.text: Two of these fit under my full-size bed perfectly and the clear top allows me to see what's inside when I'm looking for something. Well-made and exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Mamazabakaka

customer_reviews.title: Make Room
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for storage of shoes / seasonal clothing / blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Kadgee

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for under bed storage - it fits quite a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for under bed storage - it fits quite a lot considering the size. I was able to store all my winter boots and shoes in it and won't have to worry about the footwear getting dusty over the summer. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Billycasey

customer_reviews.title: Fits so much stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: This storage box is awesome! I can fit so much stuff in it!! The size is 38" long x 17" wide x 6" tall. I was able to fit 15 winter sweaters, 5 long sleeve shirts, 4 sweat pants and 6 t-shirts and there was still room for more. The material is very durable and thick. There are double zippers which help to open either side at a time and also creates a nice seal for the items inside. There are also two handles on each side, which make it easy to move around. I highly recommend this for under bed storage or any spot in your home where storage is limited.
customer_reviews.author: MC Florida

customer_reviews.title: Works well but missing internal structure
customer_reviews.text: Great for clothes or fabric. I recently wanted to make room and move my craft room. I ended up taking all my fabrics off their bolts and folded them before storing them in the bags. It’s amazing how much space that frees up. The clear top let’s you to see what fabrics are inside and with the all around zipper it’s easy to access the fabrics and select the one you want to pull out.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi-chan

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to handle
customer_reviews.text: These need to have a sturdier bottom. When you pack them and then pick them up they just fold in on themselves. Very awkward and difficult to slide under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Larae Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Works for how I am using it.
customer_reviews.text: Before ordering this item, I read the reviews. I took all of them under review and ordered this product. I needed something to store under the bed cloth and wool items that lay flat. This is perfect for my things. I did open the cardboard box the item came in and used it as a bottom for support as suggested. This was a great idea. I fulled it full and slid it under the bed. Perfect. Some of the reviews said the handles came off so I was careful not to put much stress on them. I think these work well depending what you put in them and for me it works.
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I need.
customer_reviews.text: Not necessarily different from advertised but this has absolutely no structure so sides will not stand up unless completely full of clothes. If you can fill it, it's good for storage and keeping your dog (or at least my dog) from crawling under the bed in bad weather. Also zero confidence that this would keep clothes moths or anything out if that's a concern: zipper works but does not seem airtight or really restrictive for small bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this purcahse. I was going to order another large plastic container, but they're so expensive and just barely fit under my bed. For the price, I decided to give this one a try and I'm glad I did. It holds much more than I expected snd it pliable so I can move it around a lot better than the plastic containers. Nice clear top to see what's in it and a zipper for easy access. I actually got more in here than I did the plastic one that's a little larger. I'm using it for crocheted inventory items for my etsy shop.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Under bed storage!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They are huge. Bigger then I expected, was kind of excited when i took it out of the plastic. Only thing i didnt like were the sides of the "storage bin" they wouldnt hold up at first. You have to play with it a bit but once you get items into it, it holds very well. I suggest these to anyone. Oh fits perfect under the childrens beds. Very useful. Definitely buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Heaven

customer_reviews.title: IKEA product maybe better
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit as I did not want to commute to IKEA to pick up their storage bags as I had done so in the past. For the money, it was expected, but the ones in IKEA are much better and bigger. The quality of these bags were mediocre at best.... I would personally if it wasn't for the distance prefer the one in IKEA better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly under the bed.
customer_reviews.text: One of them ripped along the seems after I had the clothes in it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great once 2nd time not too sure - does what it needs to
customer_reviews.text: I had already purchased this before and I loved it it was pretty sturdy and great but this time around it was a little more fragile upon unzipping it it tore from a corner I’ve managed to put tape over it to make it work overall it does do what it supposed to do it’s just this time around it was a little lacking in quality
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy material
customer_reviews.text: These looked nothing like the picture when taken out of the package. It did not hold shape and was VERY flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive western show blanket storage
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to store my western show saddle blankets, they fit perfectly. I only have two but I'm guessing I could fit at least two more in the bag. We'll see how it works long term, but it's breathable so I wouldn't expect mildew to be an issue, and I really just need to keep the major dust off the blankets so I expect it will work fine for me. Also, compared to "real" saddle pad storage bags the price was a steal, so definitely worth it to try.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nolin

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for extra linens I can store under my bed, and it can hold a lot! I have at least 2 or 3 different sheet sets and one bulky blanket and I swear I could probably still fit a few more smaller things in. I was sure it wouldn't zip up but it did. I'll probably end up ordering more of these later down the line for my winter clothes and keepsakes.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Stadelhofer

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I had higher hopes for this product. I've had it for a long time, and it does fulfill it's purpose of holding things underneath my bed. However, the zipper pull broke off a few weeks after I bought it, luckily there were two pulls so I have to be extra careful when opening and closing it as not to break the other one. The zipper isn't great quality. Next time I'd go with something more sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Shackleford

customer_reviews.title: Good storage alternative
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to store out of season clothes under my bed. I have barely 6" to try to shove stuff under my bed and most storage containers are taller then that. These work because they collapse and can maneuver them to fit. Nice solid zipper and the price was right. I can't judge quality or endurance yet as I just got them.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Diva

customer_reviews.title: Overall good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The zipper tends to open up where it's not suppose. I unzipped and RIP and it's fine, just a bit anoying when moving it. Overall pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly under the bed
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of these storage bags. I use them for blankets, sheets, and comforters. They fit under my bed easily. Another plus is the see through plastic so I know what is in each one. I can pull on the handle and have had no problem with it tearing. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Camper living
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are full time RVers and are always on the lookout for storage and organization options. I am in love with the quality and price of this under bed storage!! It is a great size and fits alot and when it is not in use it folds up to be easily stored. Very sturdy and the zipper keeps out dust.
customer_reviews.author: dolly

customer_reviews.title: Not a high quality product
customer_reviews.text: This did not work out well. I need something with a little structure. Very flimsy and very thin material/ zipper was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: I recently downsized my living space, and have lots of stuff with nowhere to put it. These under-bed storage bags are a God-send! The material is sturdy and strong, I like the see-through top, and I have ordered two more.
customer_reviews.author: Joan C Wrenn

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy but a good value
customer_reviews.text: The material is breathable but very flimsy. The only way it would stand in the nice rectangle shape that is pictured is if it is completely full. I was hoping there would be some cardboard side inserts to keep it popped up, but no. I did fill it almost all the way and it is under a couch, barely visible, so this isn’t the end of the world. All in all, about what I should expect for the low price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great product
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely impressed with these. I ordered 2 for all my clothing to be stored under my bed. I wanted as much floor space available possible in my room and I wasn't interested in having to need two dressers in my room. My bed frame has a 14inch clearance not that it mattered because these are sleek. They hold their shape when packed properly. I have carpet in my room and I have no issues dragging them back and forth with the clear window right side up.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin L.

customer_reviews.title: Torn with first use
customer_reviews.text: The first time I scooted this under my bed, the clear plastic caught on my bed frame and tore a hole right in it. It’s pretty flimsy plastic. Beware of any sharp edges on the frame or these will tear easily. I guess that is the risk you take to have the advantage of the clear top to see what’s inside.
customer_reviews.author: Stiletto

customer_reviews.title: So much space
customer_reviews.text: It really does look tiny when you first open it. But once you shove everything in, there is ample space. I bought two just in case I needed more room for my summer clothes but it all fit well into one bag. It was a bit harder (but not really) to use at first because the sides fell down a bit. But after stacking in the clothes, the sides filled out fine. The zipper is of good quality. My clothes did go over the bag a bit but since it is made out of cloth rather than plastic, it was able to easily squeeze everything in with no trouble at all. Will probably buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ngoc

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Ripped
customer_reviews.text: I like the cost of this item; however, the plastic ripped when pulling it out from underneath my bed. Could have been an issue with it being stuffed too full or my bed being lower than most and not measuring properly. Either way, ended up going into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jaynes

customer_reviews.title: I really like this. I can put my good bedspread in ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. I can put my good bedspread in it when there is no company and it stays beautiful. My grandson uses one for his toy cars and my granddaughter uses hers for her stuffed animals. Great tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer. Beverly Lentz

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying, very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with it. It fits perfectly under my bed. I can fit quite a bit in there which is good and it is definitely lightweight. Much easier to move around then the big plastic bins I have my Fabric in. I'll probably end up ordering more next month.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to store some sweaters and also to store some quilts that I put into pillowcases. Gosh for the price they are amazing. They are not reinforced or what I would say sturdy but I knew that from the description.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Arrington

customer_reviews.title: These are a little flimsy, but they hold a ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a little flimsy, but they hold a lot and fit under my bed that only has 5" of clearance. I read some reviews about it not sliding very well on carpet, but if you turn it over with the plastic on the bottom, there's no problem. I could fit three under my queen bed perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Bigger on the inside
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these organizing bags to reduce space taken in my closet that was occupied by some extra blankets, shoes, and seasonal tops. I was able to fit 4 blankets, 6 heavy sweaters and hoodies into one bag; that alone held most of my largest spare items. The second bag held all my shoes, slippers, nick-knacks with some space to spare. They arrive in a small package, but the full volume is seriously spacious. Realistically, I could fit 1-2 more bags under my twin mattress, but I think 2 organizers were just right. I'm very pleased with the value and quality of this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: dont order
customer_reviews.text: item was very small when it arrived and i was not very happy when it arrived and it came late. pieces missing and what was there it wasn't very much.arrived late and box was damaged not at all what was listed like my money back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good storage option
customer_reviews.text: Great for storing clothes or other items u set the baby’s crib! Not too sturdy but I wasn’t expecting it to be. The zipper has held strong! I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi L.

customer_reviews.title: This has been great and is exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved my daughters into their own rooms, and needed something to store their things under the bed. This has been great and is exactly what we needed. It holds a lot of stuff. It is a durable material with a strong zipper, and handles on the ends to help move in and out from under the bed. I plan to purchase a couple more to help in my own room.
customer_reviews.author: macsmama

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I bought it to store my gift wrapping stuff and it's perfect! It holds so much and fits nicely under furniture. Very easy to pull out and open to find everything I need in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An effective organizer, for the price
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked firm cardboard sides, but was still able to use these (I bought 3) for guest blankets, sheets and towels, and store them under the new Zinnus 12" bed frame I bought. I needed something quick and these came in a day or two and helped me begin to organize the bedroom and de-clutter. Another good purchase, and good storage solution.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hanneman

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, but not durable
customer_reviews.text: I really like having squishy bags that can fit under the beds for extra storage. I purchased 2 of these with hopes of storing a few extra blankets and a few extra pillows. I am happy with the room the bag has, but as I was closing the second bag that only had 3 blankets (not stuffed as I still have room for more), the plastic viewing came away from its seam. Disappointed that it isn’t more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Mahala

customer_reviews.title: Love these to store seasonal clothes out of sight
customer_reviews.text: These are so nice an hold all my winter clothes. I bought 2 an they fit great under bed. Easy to move around an i cant believe how much they hold.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara scott

customer_reviews.title: Better design needed!
customer_reviews.text: I use for storage under the bed.. The layout should have included some type of sturdy material or cardboard thereby making it easier to manage.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Frayer

customer_reviews.title: Under the bed storage! Works just as I expected ...
customer_reviews.text: Under the bed storage! Works just as I expected. I put a full size comforter, 1 fitted sheet, 1 top sheet, & pillow case inside. I didn't think it was going to all fit. Nor did I think it would fit under the low bed. Will be buying another. The storage possiblities are endless.
customer_reviews.author: Jay AL

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Received this item today. I was disappointed that it is so thin. The best way I can describe it is: a thin terrycloth sheet with a somewhat plastic feeling material underneath it. I immediately put it back in the package and am returning it. It's not much thicker than a sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Askins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for storing things that clutter up my closet. I like that they are soft sided. The sides and footboard of my bed are only 4 1/2" from the floor. I can easily squish these down enough to get them under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: missmiss92065

customer_reviews.title: Like the price and the product does the job
customer_reviews.text: Like the price and the product does the job. Had a bunch of winter clothes in a dresser I was selling, so this was a great alternative to space saving. I don't have a lot of height underneath my bed, and I like the fact that I could squish this underneath to fit.
customer_reviews.author: CBee

customer_reviews.title: Storage bags did the trick.
customer_reviews.text: This product was sturdy strong and it did what is was designed to do. I would recommend these storage bags.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great Underbed Storage
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these to store blankets and out of season clothes. The zippers work well to keep items inside. They are sturdy enough for me and more manuverable than the large air bags that are noisy, hard to move and keep the clips on them. I like the size and rectangle shape of the underbed storage ones better also.
customer_reviews.author: ebsand

customer_reviews.title: It's great for under the bed storage
customer_reviews.text: It's great for under the bed storage. Great size, and you can zip it to keep your items free of dirt and dust.
customer_reviews.author: Yal

customer_reviews.title: Storage
customer_reviews.text: The bad: You get what you pay for! I bought two and one was split along zipper. I put the two together then put my sweaters in the combined container. The good: holds quite a bit and fits easily under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Good storage space
customer_reviews.text: Great place to store (hide) all my unused yarn, and is dust proof.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! They hold a lot! I'm a braided so I have lots of weave and this is perfect. Slides just fine under the bed. It has a handle.
customer_reviews.author: vmilton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect underbed storage
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace a different one I had where the see-through part ripped open. This one seems more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Rei-

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: This was cheaply made but I was going to try and use it anyway. I've used it less than a month and yesterday the zipper broke... I tried to fix it and it cannot be fixed... Very frustrating! I will not be ordering this again.... I am trying to work with the shoe bag I bought at the same time - but it is cheap too and will probably tear soon! I am upset with my purchases.... I ended up throwing the under bed storage bag into the trash! Susan497@sbcglobal.net
customer_reviews.author: Susan W. West

customer_reviews.title: Does the job...not buying agaim though
customer_reviews.text: Came in packaging that had some sort of oily film on the outside...little gross. When I took it out I noticed one of the corners had come undone from the plastic/fabric seam. Definitely will not buy again. Rather pay a little more for a possible better product.
customer_reviews.author: elisa

customer_reviews.title: This fits tons of sweaters, I'll be using it ...
customer_reviews.text: This fits tons of sweaters, I'll be using it for out of season clothes to store under my bed. It is a little flimsy though so don't expect something with an inner frame
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sturdy case, holds a lot of blankets, quilts or seasonal clothing and fits under bed.
customer_reviews.text: This excellent case holds a lot of blankets, quilts or seasonal clothing and fits under the bed as advertised. I would buy another one. The zipper is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Book Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice big size, length! Love the see through top!
customer_reviews.text: Item came in mail rather quickly. Im impressed with the size. I plan on storing summer clothes, sheets, sweaters under my bed. Plan on using it for kids clothes the same. I havent used it yet so i hope its durable. Seems okay.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Scherping

customer_reviews.title: zip Home zipper
customer_reviews.text: They are full of pillows(2) and i could fit two more. Very roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. One fit all my winter coats hats and scarves. Perfect under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t rigid, but they are exactly what I needed for under our bed to store blankets!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what it claims to be - an under the bed organizer. I just purchased mine - but so far, so good. It's got double zippers, held plenty of items, and I placed mine in the closet - fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Likes Under The Bed Organizer & Usability Of This Item Is 100%❗😎❌
customer_reviews.text: Bought Item For My Granddaughter & She Super Likes The Under The Bed Organizer❗ Right Away Placed Her Lighted Mirror, Bought @ Amazon, & Other Articles Likeliest She Keeps In A Secure Place❗Lightweight Ideal❗❌😀
customer_reviews.author: Esther Acosta

customer_reviews.title: ... bed organizer held more than I expected which is great although the zipper seems like a weak spot but ...
customer_reviews.text: This Under the bed organizer held more than I expected which is great although the zipper seems like a weak spot but we will see if it holds up. Anyway I'm very pleased with these for the price and I may even order more.
customer_reviews.author: RJJ

customer_reviews.title: looks good and seems to breath well
customer_reviews.text: decent bed organizer, looks good and seems to breath well. Not quite large enough to fit in my full size comforter, a pillow and the mattress cover so wish it was just a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job and holds quite a bit. I like them being collapsible, but it would have been nice to have a foldable cardboard bottom for some added support.
customer_reviews.author: jpumpmeup

customer_reviews.title: Awesome find
customer_reviews.text: I bought one to see how well it was made and bought 3 more. They are wonderful for all kinds of things from clothes, linens to the long wrapping paper!
customer_reviews.author: C Schlitz

customer_reviews.title: Good Storage but Easy to Rip
customer_reviews.text: Not too sturdy as the plastic top ripped pretty quickly, but it does hold a lot and is easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Opened the package and found one of the seams was ripped; material was really flimsy and could tell the others would break soon. I had bought another organizer of the same brand but didn't bother opening it since the quality of this one didn't make me confident the other was better, especially since they were made of the same material.
customer_reviews.author: CSF

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing my shoes under the bed.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my shoes protected from dust and great for storing my shoes under my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flat and not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The size of this looked perfect, but when I tried to store my clothing under my bed with it, it completely collapsed. I haven't been able to get it to have structure yet.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Ripped the very first time I used it - waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The entire side ripped the very first time I used it and I hadn't even moved it yet, i had just packed it with clothes and went to zip and it was ripped. I didn't even get to use it. Poorly made. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: skyeisis

customer_reviews.title: Spacey
customer_reviews.text: Its a bit "flimsy" as I thought it would sit on its own but its still great! I use it for my babies clothes.... Awesome space
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Seems like they will fall apart if they are slid out ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely flimsy but does the job for now. I don't get into them too often. Sides are not even slightly stiff. Seems like they will fall apart if they are slid out from under the bed on the reg. Prob not recyclable so it should be made to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Took a month to get then the Zippers we’re broken amazon gave me a hard time about my refund.. JUNK
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Payton

customer_reviews.title: Great underbed storage.
customer_reviews.text: Great for blankets, I placed under the bed. See thru is helpful however a clear pocket to label contents would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: California housewife

customer_reviews.title: These are great! I was able to fit 4 blankets in ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I was able to fit 4 blankets in each and store them under our bed. Downsizing and wanting to hold onto them, but keep them out of site. ZIZ storage bags were the perfect solution!
customer_reviews.author: cathy foster

customer_reviews.title: okay for the price, but not durable
customer_reviews.text: The strap was torn immediately. But it does the job which is storing off-season clothes under my bed and I like the fact that the top of it is transparent (you can see which clothes is where). So overall, I think this product is okay for the price, but you can't use this for more than a year or two.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie&Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty thin. Hoping they last, but exactly what I needed. I went from 2 closet shelves of blankets, to one easy to store container.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: It fit most of all my winter clothes & fits under my bed easily. Am ordering another one for all my extra bedding. Thank you awesome product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as described.
customer_reviews.text: Storage bag was 12" tall & only 24" long, not 7" tall and 39" long. Will not fit under bed.
customer_reviews.author: Navi

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product. It is not made of good quality materials. The zipper broke the first time I got into. I threw it away already.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Davis

customer_reviews.title: great storage option
customer_reviews.text: so much room! packed away lots of warm weather clothing for the winter months, will switch in the spring. I like that its not structured, it makes it more flexible for more stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Rondi

customer_reviews.title: Decent storage
customer_reviews.text: decent storage size. They can break easily if you over fill them.
customer_reviews.author: hkcaro129

customer_reviews.title: Good Not Great
customer_reviews.text: This serves its purpose but isn’t super durable and feels like it could break easily. Still, I like that it is breathable and can fit quite a bit in it!
customer_reviews.author: Marita Koudsi

customer_reviews.title: great storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 bags. I was able to fit one king sized comforter aand full size bed blanket in one and 6 throws and blankets in the other. I still could have put more in.
customer_reviews.author: Joan L. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: My bag came with a hole in the lining. ...
customer_reviews.text: My bag came with a hole in the lining. Very disappointing! Also, this bag is difficult to slide under the bed if you have carpet floors.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bed pillows
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the zippers are funky. I am using these to store bed pillows in preparation for move/storage. Two pillows, even Kings will fit perfectly. Have also used for blankets and throws . These seem best for pillows especially.
customer_reviews.author: trudy

customer_reviews.title: storage
customer_reviews.text: It was a perfect fit under our guest bed for linen extras.
customer_reviews.author: Rita A. Valdes

customer_reviews.title: not durable
customer_reviews.text: This bag ripped within the first few times of pulling it out from under the bed. Very disappointed in it's quality. I duct taped it up so I could continue to use it. Should have requested a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent build, seems that I will last for a long time. It can easily fit a Cal King comforter set, with some more free space to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: It's my 2nd time ordering these...Bought 2 initially and went back for 3 more because of the superior quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Received later than I hoped because I received a different product in error. One had a hole at the seam but I used it any. Not very sturdy but the size was good
customer_reviews.author: LoveJerm

product_meta.title: Ziz Home Zippered Under Bed Storage Bag (1, 2, 3 Pack) Soft Breathable Anti-Mold Fabric | Underbed Clothes Storage, Linen Blanket Storage, Sweater Storage, Duvet Storage Bins Clear Window (1)
feature_bullets: ★ 39" x 17" x 7" H ★ COMPLETELY BREATHABLE; made with fabric that allows air to circulate inside, ultimately keeping stored items fresh for longer.
★ MULTIPURPOSE STORAGE OPTIONS; whether you want to tidy up your closets or create extra storage space under the bed, this versatile underbed organizer has got you covered in perfect style.
★ 100% ECO-FRIENDLY; out with disposable bags and boxes, in with the breathable storage bag! Re-use it as many times as you want and reduce the amount of waste that ends up polluting the environment.
★ EASY RETRIEVAL DESIGN; with a transparent top, you don’t need to go through piles before finding what you’re looking for. Save time, just peep through the”window” and see if that’s the bag to open.
★ DURABLE; the tough material endures repeated sliding over closet shelves or under-bed surfaces. Furthermore, the strong zip guarantees total safety for your clothes over long periods of storage.
